title: "Study Suggests What the Human-Robot Relationship Looks Like"
excerpt: "For instance, how do humans respond to the autonomous actions of the robots that they control? Recent research in Scientific Reports finds that the independent actions and “attitudes” of semi-autonomous robots positively influence those of their operators."
